source: 好的爱情使你通过一个人看到整个世界，坏的爱情使你为了一个人舍弃整个世界。
result: Good love makes you see the whole world through one person, and bad love makes you abandon the whole world for one person.

source: 如果你真要梦想成真，就先从梦中醒来。
result: If you really want your dream to come true, then wake up from it.

source: 你如果还相信她爱你，你就是在欺骗自己。
result: If you still believe she loves you, you're lying to yourself.

source: 人生最糟的不是失去爱的人，而是因为太爱一个人而失去了自己
result: The worst thing in life is not to lose someone, but to lose yourself because you love someone too much.

source: 人生就是这样的往往你觉得重要的到最后都变成最不重要了。珍惜才是拥有一切的开始
result: That's what life is all about. It's the beginning of everything. It's the beginning of everything.

source: 那么华丽的外表，却只是你虚伪的掩饰
result: So gorgeous, but only a false cover.

source: 有时候，一个人选择离开不是因为自私，而是他心里清楚如果留下来，事情会变得更糟。
result: Sometimes a person chooses to leave not because of selfishness, but because he knows in his heart that if he stays, things will get worse.

source: 去爱一个拥有和给你正面能量的人
result: To love someone who owns and gives you positive energy.

source: 如果你选择一条保守的线路，就只能实现一个狭窄的目标
result: If you choose a conservative route, you can only achieve a narrow goal.

source: 有很多人会叫你的名字，但只有一个人让你的名字听起来那么特别。来自
result: A lot of people would call you by your name, but only one person would make your name sound so special.

source: 你唯一应该努力超越的人，就是昨天的自己
result: The only person you're supposed to be trying to get over is yesterday.

source: 生活中最神奇的事往往发生在你准备放弃希望的那一刻
result: The most amazing thing in life often happens when you're ready to give up hope.

source: 当你停止追逐错误的事物，就给了那些正确的事物一个机会，让他们抓住你
result: When you stop chasing the wrong things, you give the right things a chance to catch you.

source: 生活的主题就是，面对复杂，保持欢喜。
result: The theme of life is to stay happy in the face of complexity.

source: 在你的梦想变成现实之前，永不放弃。早
result: Don't give up until your dream becomes a reality.

source: 不要失去希望，你永远不知道明天会带来什么。
result: Don't lose hope. You never know what tomorrow will bring.

source: 我从不喜欢让别人看见我的眼泪，我宁可让别人觉得我快乐得没心没肺，也不愿意让自己看起来委屈可怜。
result: I never liked to let people see my tears, and I preferred to make people feel like I'm not happy and I don't want to make myself look pathetic.

source: 当你不能再拥有的时候，唯一可以做的就是令自己不要忘记
result: When you can't have it anymore, the only thing you can do is make yourself remember.

source: 有一天那个人走进了你的生命，你就会明白，真爱总是值得等待的
result: One day that man walks into your life, you'll understand that true love is always worth waiting for.

source: 坏记性的好处在于可以多次如同第一次般的享受到同一个美好事物带来的欢乐。
result: The advantage of bad memory is to enjoy the joy of the same good many times as it was for the first time.

source: 不知从什么时候开始，我变得连自己都感到陌生。
result: I don't know when I'm not even familiar with myself.

source: 在这个世界上，只有真正快乐的男人，才能带给女人真正的快乐
result: In this world, only a truly happy man can bring true pleasure to a woman.

source: 虽然这是一项令人劳累的工作，但是我们觉得为世界各地的残疾朋友服务是无尚荣耀的事情
result: It's a hard job, but we think it's an honor to serve our disabled friends around the world.

source: 全世界最勇猛的斗士是那些没有什么可以失去的人
result: The bravest warriors in the world are those who have nothing to lose.

source: 他并不是不爱你，只是没有按你想要的方式爱你。。。
result: He doesn't love you the way you want him to.

source: 有些人说眼见为实，但是眼睛也会欺骗你。重要的不是你看见了什么，而是你是否透过表象看到了真相。
result: Some people say it's true, but the eyes lie to you. It's not what you see, it's whether you see the truth through appearances.

source: 世界这么大我们还是遇见了，世界这么小我们还是错过了。
result: We've met the world so big, we've missed it so small.

source: 未来是从今天开始的，不是明天
result: The future begins today, not tomorrow.

source: 我只是需要一个可以说话的人
result: I just need someone to talk to.

source: 别人会忘记你说过的话，做过的事。但永远不会忘记你给他们的感觉
result: People will forget what you said, what you did. But they will never forget what you feel for them.

source: 对一颗不快乐的心，一个无声的拥抱胜过千言万语
result: For an unhappy heart, a silent embrace is more than a thousand words.

source: 纯浓的巧克力，就像初尝爱情的滋味那般美好。
result: Pure chocolate, as beautiful as the first taste of love.

source: 我们不敢不是因为事情难，是因为我们不敢所以事情变难了
result: It's not because it's hard. It's because it's hard.

source: 无论过去发生过什么，无论你是否准备好了，下一刻都是一个崭新的开始
result: Whatever happened in the past, whether you're ready or not, the next moment is a fresh start.

source: 与其用泪水悔恨昨天，不如用汗水拼搏今天
result: It's better to fight with sweat than to regret yesterday.

source: 最后和你在一起的人，往往是你想不到的人
result: Those who end up with you are often the ones you can't imagine.

source: 让一个人变强大的最好方式，就是拥有一个想要保护的人
result: The best way to make a person strong is to have someone to protect.

source: 我觉得我就是一文盲
result: I think I'm an illiterate person.

source: 改变心态只需一分钟，而这一分钟却能改变一整天。
result: A change of mind takes only one minute, and this one minute can change all day.

source: 太耀眼的城市不适合看星星，就象你的心不适合谈安定。
result: Too bright a city is not for the stars, like your heart is not for peace.

source: 迷上一个人只需一分钟，喜欢上一个人需要一小时，爱上一个人则要一天，然而，忘记一个人却是一辈子的事情
result: It takes a minute to fall in love with a man, an hour to fall in love with a man, and it takes a day to forget that a person is a life-long thing.

source: 享受生命中的小事情，因为有一天你回首往事，也许会发现它们其实是很重要的事情
result: Enjoy the little things in life, because one day you look back and you may find that they're really important things.

source: 在生活的键盘上，你总需要一只手指去按退出键。
result: On the keyboard of life, you always need a finger to press the exit key.

source: 当我们第一次相见，我并没想到你对我如此重要。。
result: When we first met, I didn't think you were so important to me.

source: 学会欣赏自己拥有什么，之前的时间逼着你欣赏你的
result: Learn to appreciate what you have. You were forced to appreciate it before.

source: 在生活中，我们将遇到无法克服的困难。有时我们感到无助并陷入绝望的境地。在这种情况下，何去何从取决于我们是否拥有足够的勇于拼搏的精神
result: In life, we're going to face insurmountable difficulties. Sometimes we feel helpless and desperate. In this case, it depends on whether we have the courage to fight.

source: 我们应该珍惜我们永恒的友谊
result: We should cherish our eternal friendship.

source: 微笑是改善容貌的一种并不昂贵的方式
result: Smiling is a less expensive way to improve appearances.

source: 喜欢一个人是宿命
result: It's destiny to like someone.

source: 能发现自己的错误是智慧，能改正自己的错误是勇敢
result: It's wisdom to find out what's wrong with you. It's courage to correct what's wrong with you.

source: 每个人都生活在各自过去中，我们用一分钟去认识一个人，用一小时去喜欢一个人，再用一天去爱上一个人，到最后，却用一辈子去忘记一个人
result: Everyone lives in their own past, we meet a man for a minute, we love a man for an hour, we fall in love for another day, and in the end, we forget a person for the rest of our lives.

source: 谢谢你曾经来过，很遗憾你还是走开了。
result: Thank you for coming. I'm sorry you left.

source: 有时候，你给别人最简单的建议，却是自己最难做到的。
result: Sometimes the simplest advice you give others is the hardest for yourself.

source: 我之所以懂得爱都是因为你。
result: The reason I know love is because of you.

source: 青春，沿途再美的风景也只不过是一纸风华。
result: Youth, a beautiful view along the way, is nothing more than a piece of paper.

source: 我最需要的就是你需要我
result: What I need most is for you to need me.

source: 我只是一朵向日葵，等待着属于我的唯一的阳光
result: I'm just a sunflower waiting for the only sun that belongs to me.

source: 越早把孩子当成大人，他就越早成为大人
result: The sooner he treats the child as a grown-up, the sooner he becomes a grown-up.

source: 努力工作，保持开朗，让爱照料剩下的一切。
result: Work hard, stay open, let love take care of everything that's left.

source: 那些能把你伤得最痛的人，通常都是你爱得最深的人。
result: Those who hurt you the most are usually the ones you love the most.

source: 这个世界上最好的爱，就是让自己爱的人找到他的爱。
result: The best love in the world is to let someone he loves find his love.

source: 只有泪水洗过的眼睛，才有更开阔的视野
result: Only eyes that have been washed by tears will have a wider view.

source: 你最需要的是爱，爱是你一切所需。
result: What you need most is love. Love is all you need.

source: 你不是一个天生的赢家，也不是一个天生的失败者，你只是你自己创造的你
result: You're not a natural winner, you're not a natural loser. You're just the one you created.

source: 能在最不起眼的事情上找到快乐的人是最富有的人
result: The one who can find happiness in the least visible thing is the richest one.

source: 生命必须有裂缝，阳光才照得进来。
result: Life has to have cracks before the sun comes in.

source: 别试图在生命里勉强留住某人，如果他们要走，就放手。
result: Don't try to keep someone alive, and if they want to go, let go.

source: 沉默是成长的标志，而成熟的标志，就是如何去沉默。
result: Silence is the sign of growth, and the sign of maturity is how to silence.

source: 找一件事做他一辈子找一个人爱她一辈子
result: Find something to do and find someone to love her for the rest of his life.

source: 不要让自己活得像个笑话。
result: Don't let yourself live like a joke.

source: 没有比经久不衰的友谊更重要的东西，尤其是在这个不停变化的世界里。
result: There is nothing more important than enduring friendship, especially in this changing world.

source: 一切都会好的，也许不是今天，但是最终都会好的
result: Everything's gonna be okay. Maybe it's not today, but eventually it's gonna be okay.

source: 我在这部剧中最喜欢的场景总是与角色间的情感纠葛有关系
result: My favorite scene in this play is always related to the emotional relationship between the characters.

source: 我爱你，不是因为你是一个怎样的人，而是因为我喜欢与你在一起时的感觉。
result: I love you, not because you're a person, but because I like how I feel when I'm with you.

source: 每个人需要的仅仅是一点点爱，大大的希望和不可动摇的信念
result: Everyone needs just a little love, great hope and unshakeable faith.

source: 你的过去不重要，重要的是你的未来
result: Your past doesn't matter. What matters is your future.

source: 当你积极地看待生活，并以此作为你的日常准则时，你就会找到快乐的真谛
result: When you look at life positively and use it as your daily rule, you find the truth of happiness.

source: 当你不得不向周围的人妥协，违背自己的意愿与道德，也许是时候换一批人走进你的世界了
result: When you have to compromise with the people around you, against your will and morality, maybe it's time for another group of people to enter your world.

source: 无论多么艰难，都要继续向前，因为只有你放弃的那一刻，你才输了
result: No matter how hard it is, keep going, because only the moment you give up, you lose.

source: 我不缅怀过去的历史，而致力于未来的梦想。
result: I do not remember the history of the past, but I am committed to the dreams of the future.

source: 距离并不可怕，可怕的是心越来越远
result: It's not scary. It's getting far and far.

source: 不过昨天多么糟糕，也不要让它影响到你的现在和将来。
result: But yesterday was so bad that it should not be allowed to affect your present and future.

source: 你不会知道自己有多坚强，直到除了坚强，你别无选择时。
result: You don't know how strong you are until you have no choice but to be strong.

source: 真正的朋友会握着你的手，告诉你一切都会好起来的
result: A real friend will hold your hand and tell you everything's gonna be okay.

source: 我都要好好的对自己爱自己。好好对待自己，为了明天所给予的馈礼，而不是昨天所带走的印记
result: I'm going to love myself. I'm going to take care of myself for tomorrow's gift, not the mark I took yesterday.

source: 有时候，我们不要想太多，顺着自己的心意就好了
result: Sometimes we don't have to think too much, just follow our own wishes.

source: 要实现梦想，最好先醒来。
result: It's better to wake up if you want to realize your dreams.

source: 生活的意义应该像种树，你并没有期望有一天能坐在树荫下享受它带来的阴凉
result: The meaning of life should be like planting a tree. You didn't expect one day to sit in the shade and enjoy the coolness it brings.

source: 从梦中醒来，梦想也许能成真。
result: Wake up from your dreams. Dreams may come true.

source: 在某个不经意的瞬间，才发现，原来，我一直都只是一个人。
result: It was only at some unexpected moment that I found out that I was always just a person.

source: 面对危机怡然微笑的人，多半已经找到了替罪羊。
result: Most of those smiling in the face of the crisis have found scapegoats.

source: 你可怀疑任何人，但绝不要怀疑你自己
result: You can suspect anyone, but never yourself.

source: 生活就是改变。有时痛苦，有时精彩。但大多数时候，两者兼有。
result: Life is change. Sometimes it's painful, sometimes it's wonderful. But most of the time, it's both.

source: 决定我们成为什么样人的，不是我们的能力，而是我们的选择
result: It's not our ability to decide who we are, it's our choice.

source: 对世界来说，你只是普通的一个人，但对某个人来说，你可能就是他的整个世界
result: For the world, you're just an ordinary person, but for someone, you could be his whole world.

source: 朋友，就是我们自己选择的家人
result: Friend, it's the family we choose.

source: 你做出了这个决定，这是你的代价
result: You made this decision. It's your price.

source: 我想知道一生中有多少人，我看到了却从没有注意过
result: I want to know how many people I've seen and never noticed in my life.

source: 永远不说再见，我不想仅仅成为一段回忆。
result: Never say goodbye, and I do not want to be just a memory.

source: 你只是我生命中一个小小的过客，你了解的仅仅是我的表面，你仅仅是我生命中的小小一部分。
result: You're just a little passerby in my life, and you know it's just my surface, and you're just a little bit of my life.

source: 升级完成。开始新的篇章。非常期待余生盯着他妈的滚滚红尘发呆。
result: Upgrade complete. Start a new chapter. Looking forward to the rest of your life.

source: 所谓成功，就是爱你自己，喜欢自己做的事，以及喜欢自己做事的方式
result: Success is how you love yourself, what you do and how you like to do it.

source: 没人能够改变另一个人，但却能成为别人改变的一个原因。
result: No one can change another, but it can be a reason for others to change.

source: 早上醒来想到的第一个人和晚上睡觉前想到的最后一个人要么是你幸福的缘由，要么是你痛苦的根源。
result: The first person who wakes up in the morning and the last person who comes to bed at night is either the reason for your happiness or the cause of your suffering.

source: 没有人可以回到过去重新开始，但谁都可以从今日开始，书写一个全然不同的结局。
result: No one can go back to the past and start again, but anyone can start today and write a completely different ending.

source: 很多人一开始为了梦想而忙，后来忙的忘了梦想。
result: Many people were busy with their dreams at first, and then they were busy forgetting them.

source: 除了你自己没有人知道你想要什么。
result: Nobody but yourself knows what you want.

source: 我多想在你身边醒来。
result: I want to wake up next to you.

source: 我觉得自己很蠢，而且这种蠢带有传染性
result: I think I'm stupid, and it's contagious.

source: 摆在我们面前的困难并不是要阻挡我们，而是唤起我们的勇气和力量
result: The difficulty before us is not to stop us, but to summon our courage and strength.

source: 想发现新大陆，就得做好很长时间看不到岸边的准备。
result: In order to discover a new continent, it would be necessary to be prepared not to see the shore for a long time.

source: 当有人离开你的生活时，随他们去吧。这只是给更好的人留足了进入你生活的空间
result: When people leave your life, let them go. It's just to give better people space to get into your life.

source: 当我站在人生最高处的时候，我觉得那是我觉得最美丽的时刻
result: When I was at the top of my life, I thought it was the most beautiful moment I ever felt.

source: 生命的价值也许并不能用长度去衡量，而在于我们如何使用了这些时光，让自己回望来路无怨无悔。
result: The value of life may not be measured by the length of time, but by how we use it to bring ourselves back to life without regret.

source: 世界太大，生命这样短，要把它过得尽量像自己想要的那个样子。
result: The world is too big, and life is so short, to live as much as you want.

source: 我们是一家人，手牵手一同步入黑暗，虽然我们可能信仰不同，但我相信这几句话能代表所有信仰的精神。
result: We are a family, holding hands in the dark, and while we may believe in different faiths, I believe that these words represent the spirit of all faiths.

source: 在这世上珍贵的东西总是罕有，所以这世上只有一个你。
result: There's always something precious in this world, so there's only one you.

source: 其实好莱坞的电影套路都是一样的。
result: It's actually the same movie set in Hollywood.

source: 无论生活之路会遇到多少障碍，我都会竭尽所能地跑完这一程。
result: No matter how many obstacles I may encounter on the road to life, I will do everything in my power to finish this journey.

source: 如果你想过得快乐，那就把生活和目标结合在一起，而不是来自他人或物质。
result: If you want to be happy, then combine life and goals, not from others or from matter.

source: 这是我训练前拍得照片，我相信训练完就不会有这样的笑容了。
result: This is a photo taken before my training, and I'm sure it won't be that smile after my training.

source: 要么没有，要么全部。要么现在，要么永不
result: Either not, or all. Now, or never.

source: 从来没有人可以取代你。
result: No one can ever replace you.

source: 伤心没有用，让自己好好地生活才最重要。爱情虽美，却不是生活的全部。
result: Sadness doesn't work. It's important that you live a good life. Love is beautiful, but it's not everything.

source: 义人得脱离患难，有恶人来代替他。
result: And the righteous shall be delivered from distress, and there shall be a substitute for him.

source: 新政府的组成
result: Composition of the new Government

source: 爱情是灯，友情是影子，当灯灭了，你会发现你的周围都是影子。朋友，是在最后可以给你力量的人。
result: Love is the light, friendship is the shadow, and when the light goes out, you'll find that you're surrounded by the shadow. Friends, the person who gives you the power in the end.

source: 我们说我们爱花朵，但是我们要采。说爱树木，但是我们要砍，我想这就是为什么那么多人在听到别人说爱自己的时候充满了恐惧。
result: We say we love flowers, but we're going to pick them. We're going to cut trees, and I think that's why so many people are filled with fear when they hear people say they love themselves.

source: 爱不在于彼此凝视，而在于注视着同一个方向。
result: Love lies not in looking at one another, but in looking in the same direction.

source: 在你让别人做事情之前，先设身处地为他们想想。
result: Think of them before you let them do anything.

source: 解释永远是多余的，因为懂你的人不需要它
result: Explaining is always superfluous, because people who know you don't need it.

source: 猫头鹰是唯一能看见蓝色的鸟
result: The owl is the only bird that can see blue.

source: 经济萧条时期，有好几百万的失业者在街头游荡。
result: During the period of economic recession, millions of unemployed people wandered the streets.

source: 临在的天性就是接受、允许和包容。如果你有评判，你就无法处在当下。理由很简单，因为在临在里是没有评判的
result: The nature of being there is acceptance, consent and tolerance. If you have a judgment, you cannot be in the present. The reason is simple, because there is no judgment in the presence.

source: 无垠的沙漠热烈追求一叶绿草的爱，她摇摇头笑着飞开了。
result: The unbridled desert pursued the love of a leaf of green grass, and she shook her head and smiled and flew away.

source: 一份最新的研究报告称，随着气候变化，香蕉家族的作物将成为数百万人的主要食物来源。
result: A recent study reported that, with climate change, banana family crops would become a major source of food for millions of people.

source: 我对你有一点动心
result: I'm a little moved by you.

source: 我忍住哭，喜剧总是特别容易的落幕
result: I couldn't bear to cry. The comedy always ends very easily.

source: 我情愿做个犯错的人，也不愿错过你
result: I'd rather be a mistaker than miss you.

source: 烤面包的香味顺着走廊飘过来。
result: The smell of toast flows down the corridor.

source: 心情不好就出去走走，别让坏情绪迷乱了世界，慌乱了心。
result: If you're in a bad mood, go for a walk. Don't let the bad mood mess up the world.

source: 今天不走，明天要跑。
result: I'm not leaving today. I'm running tomorrow.

source: 两个人若是还在乎对方，无论多难，都会为爱找到出路的
result: If two people care about each other, no matter how hard it is, they'll find a way out for love.

source: 美国司法部为起诉苹果和五大出版商辩护，声称他们密谋提高电子图书的价格。
result: The United States Department of Justice defended the prosecution of Apple and five major publishers, claiming that they were conspiring to increase the price of electronic books.

source: 我应该努力做我自己。
result: I should try to be myself.

source: 朋友是时间的窃贼。
result: Friends are time thieves.

source: 生命之旅有时会变得坎坷和令人疲惫，但好伴侣却能为旅程增添许多乐趣。向你的同路人伸出友谊之手吧。
result: The journey of life can sometimes become bumpy and exhausting, but a good partner can add a lot of fun to the journey. Give your companions a hand of friendship.

source: 若要梦想实现，先从梦中醒来
result: If you want your dreams to come true, wake up from your dreams.

source: 你是否还记得，曾经答应了自己什么。
result: Do you remember ever promised yourself anything?

source: 偶尔要回头看看，否则永远都在追寻，而不知道自己失去了什么
result: You have to look back every once in a while, or you're always looking for something you don't know what you've lost.

source: 如果没有你，我在哪里又有什么可惜。
result: If it wasn't for you, I'd have had nothing to do with it.

source: 你是选择体验快乐，还是选择创造快乐，我们只有两种选择。
result: You choose to experience happiness or to create happiness, and we have only two choices.

source: 缺乏信任的感情，就像是一部没有信号的手机，只能玩游戏。
result: A feeling of lack of trust, like a cell phone without a signal, can only play games.

source: 和好朋友相互扶持，他们是很稀少的
result: They're very rare.

source: 想吃鸡蛋就得忍受鸡叫
result: If you want to eat eggs, you have to put up with chicken barking.

source: 知识比财富更值得羡慕。
result: Knowledge is more enviable than wealth.

source: 单身并不意味着你不懂爱情
result: Being single doesn't mean you don't know love.

source: 哪些痛苦的日子才是你生命中最好的日子，因为那些日子塑造了你。
result: Which painful days are the best in your life, because those days shape you.

source: 有些事，做了才知道。有些事，错了才知道。有些事，长大了才知道。
result: There are things that you know when you do. There are things that you know when you're wrong. There are things that you know when you grow up.

source: 你只须快乐点，若快乐，其他一切都会回到正轨上去。
result: You just have to be happy. If you're happy, everything else will be back on track.

source: 普通人是担心今天，把幸福留给明天。智者只求快乐，不管是今天还是明天。
result: Ordinary people worry about today, leaving happiness to tomorrow. Wise men only want happiness, today or tomorrow.

source: 我要永远健康。
result: I want to be healthy forever.

source: 请注意煤气、炉火、水以及被风刮倒的树木和电话杆。
result: Attention is drawn to the gas, fire, water, as well as to the trees and telephone poles that have been torn down by the wind.

source: 没什么能改变我对你的爱
result: Nothing can change my love for you.

source: 这还不是严格的一夫一妻制，因为还允许显贵实行多妻制。
result: This is not yet a strict monogamy, as polygamy is also allowed to take precedence.

source: 养成读书的习惯，就相当于给自己建造了一座逃避人生几乎所有不幸的避难所
result: Growing up to read is like building yourself a shelter from almost all of life's misfortunes.

source: 有时候，你只需要振作自己，继续生活。
result: Sometimes you just pull yourself together and go on living.

source: 情绪越来越少，笑容越来越少。不确定封闭自己的心，是因为害怕孤寂，还是在自我保护，只是不由自主地那样做了。
result: Less emotions, less smiles. I don't know if I'm closing my heart because I'm afraid of being alone or protecting myself. I just can't help it.

source: 不是所有事情都能如愿以偿，但是任何事情都值得尝试。
result: Not everything can be done, but everything is worth trying.

source: 你要风得风，要雨得雨，可是还是觉得生命有趣味，又嘲笑那些对世界抱希望的人。
result: You want the wind and the rain, but you still find life interesting and laugh at people who want the world.

source: 人们总说，生活中惊喜连连，有时梦境也会成真
result: People always say that surprises in life come true, sometimes dreams come true.

source: 想要无可取代，就必须时刻与众不同。
result: To be irreplaceable, it must always be different.

source: 好时光给你带来美好的回忆，坏时光给你上一堂好课。
result: Good times bring you good memories, bad times give you a good lesson.

source: 爱是一种遇见，不能等待，也不能准备。
result: Love is an encounter, cannot wait, cannot be prepared.

source: 别跟这我走，我可能领不了路。别在我前面走，我可能不跟你。也别在我旁边走。就让我他妈一个人呆着好了。
result: Don't follow me here, I may not be able to lead the way. Don't go in front of me, I may not be with you. Don't go next to me. Just leave me alone.

source: 人生不能靠心情活着，而要靠心态去生活。
result: Life is not about living in the mood, but about the mentality.

source: 目标越清晰，人就越充实。在荒诞之外找到更多自己想要的生活。在摆来摆去之中找到自我。
result: The clearer the goal, the richer the man is. Find more life than you want. Find yourself in the air.

source: 所有的故事，都有个结局。但幸运的是，我们的生活中，每个结局会变成一个新的开始
result: All stories have an end. But fortunately, every ending in our lives will be a new beginning.

source: 茫茫人海中，我一眼就认出了你。
result: I recognized you at first sight.

source: 初恋难忘，但真爱却能将之活活埋葬。
result: The first love is unforgettable, but true love can bury it alive.

source: 最爱最爱你
result: I love you so much.

source: 活要活得美好，梦要梦得热烈，爱要爱得完整。
result: Live a good life, dream a warm dream, love a full love.

source: 聪明的人只要能掌握自己，便什么也不会失去
result: A wise man who can control himself can't lose anything.

source: 这是我们这周应用课的课表
result: This is our schedule for this week's application class.

source: 我相信快乐的女孩是最漂亮的女孩。
result: I believe happy girls are the prettiest girls.

source: 我曾经因为没有鞋子很沮丧，当我一次在街上看到一个没有双脚的男人，再也不那样了。
result: I used to be depressed because I didn't have shoes, and when I saw a man on the street without feet, it never happened again.

source: 微笑向暖，安之若素
result: Smile warm, Angkor.

source: 我以为我能忘记，却还是高估了自己。
result: I thought I could forget, but I overestimated myself.

source: 正是弥尔顿所祈祷的这个圣灵，指导上帝创造了宇宙。
result: It is this Holy Spirit that Milton prays to guide God in the creation of the universe.

source: 纵使困难重重，也不丧失勇气。
result: Even with all the difficulties, there is no loss of courage.

source: 朋友是知道你心里哼的那首歌，还能在你忘词的时候帮你唱出来的人
result: A friend is the one who knows the song you're groaning and sings it for you when you forget your words.

source: 人活在世上是不能太贪心的，要学会取舍
result: You can't live in the world too greedy. You have to learn to choose.

source: 有时候，你需要出去走走，清醒一下大脑，想想自己是谁，想去何方
result: Sometimes you need to go for a walk, wake up, think about who you are, where you want to go.

source: 生命没有系蝴蝶结，但它仍然是一份礼物。
result: Life is not a bow, but it is still a gift.

source: 当你离开的时候
result: ♪ When you leave ♪

source: 你看到什么样的世界，你就拥有什么样的内心。或者反过来，你拥有什么样的内心，你就会看到什么样的世界
result: What kind of world do you see? Or, in turn, what kind of heart do you see?

source: 我能感觉到你在忘记我。
result: I can feel you forgetting me.

source: 假如我们把自己力所能及的事都完成了，我们会真的令自己大吃一惊。各位，早安
result: If we did everything we could, we'd really surprise ourselves. Good morning, everyone.

source: 你总是想惹我发火
result: You're always trying to piss me off.

source: 名人们穷其毕生之力追求成名，然后带起墨镜避人耳目。
result: Famous people have spent their entire lives seeking to be famous, and then bring their sunglasses to the ears and eyes.

source: 有了你，黑暗不再是黑暗。
result: With you, darkness is no longer darkness.

source: 当大多数人看到你的黑暗面时上帝总能看到你的发光点
result: God can always see your light when most people see your dark side.

source: 无垠的沙漠热烈追求一叶绿草的爱，她摇摇头笑着飞开了。
result: The unbridled desert pursued the love of a leaf of green grass, and she shook her head and smiled and flew away.

source: 有两种人，一种人在做事，一种人在领功
result: There's two kinds of people, one kind of work, one kind of work.

source: 承诺再多，都做不到。那也只不过还是谎言
result: You can't promise as much as you want. It's just a lie.

source: 如果我说我想一个人静一静，其实我比任何时候都需要你。
result: If I say I want to be alone, I need you more than ever.

source: 爱情就像一只蝴蝶，它喜欢飞到哪里，就把欢乐带到哪里。
result: Love is like a butterfly, it likes to fly wherever it takes joy.

source: 有些话，不经意的说出口，对方却很认真的难过。
result: Some things, unwittingly said, are very serious about each other.

source: 乔布斯是一位了不起的独创者，他那绝顶创新、富有想象力的头脑定义了一个时代。
result: Jobes was a remarkable ingenuity, and his most innovative and imaginative mind defined an era.

source: 席卷全球
result: ♪ All over the world ♪

source: 美丽中国室内游泳池
result: A beautiful Chinese indoor pool.

source: 人的一生，都有一些说不出的秘密，挽不回的遗憾，触不到的梦想，忘不了的爱。
result: In a lifetime, there are secrets that cannot be told, regrets that cannot be restored, dreams that cannot be met, and love that cannot be forgotten.

source: 懂得感激是高尚者的标志
result: To be grateful is to be the symbol of a noble man.

source: 采得百花成蜜后，为谁辛苦为谁甜
result: I've picked many flowers, and I've worked hard for someone to be sweet for.

source: 任何成就都是从决定尝试开始。
result: Any achievement begins with a decision to try.

source: 不要老在别人面前，倾诉你的困境，袒露你的脆弱
result: Don't keep talking about your plight in front of other people.

source: 有些困难只是错觉。。。
result: Some difficulties are just delusions.

source: 这部电影卖座率奇低没有人去看
result: No one's going to see this movie at a very low rate.

source: 我行，因为我相信我行！
result: I can do it because I believe I can do it!

source: 郁闷的时候蹲下来抱抱自己，原谅别人也原谅自己。
result: When you're depressed, you sit down and hug yourself, and you forgive others and you forgive yourself.

source: 年轻意味着无限的可能
result: Young means infinite possibilities.

source: 很霸道很自私的要求，能不能变成现实很难说。
result: It's hard to say if it can become a reality.

source: 与其抱怨玫瑰丛长满了刺，还不如感激丛里竟生出了玫瑰。
result: Instead of complaining that the roses are full of thorns, it's better to have roses in the gratitude bush.

source: 说的越少，意味越多。早安
result: The less you say, the more it means. Good morning.

source: 告诉我详细情形。
result: Tell me the details.

source: 见与不见
result: See and disappear.

source: 这便医治你的肚脐，滋润你的百骨
result: This heals your belly buttons and nourishes your bones.

source: 奇迹每天都在发生。
result: Miracles happen every day.

source: 坚信梦想能实现，并果断采取行动，奇迹便会发生
result: It's a miracle to believe that dreams can be realized and to act decisively.

source: 习惯就是习惯，谁也不能将其一下子扔出窗外，只能一步一步地引下楼。
result: The habit is that no one can throw him out of the window and only lead him down one step at a time.

source: 第一次约会很傻，第一次亲吻很甜，第一次的爱无可替代，第一次伤心无法释怀
result: The first date was stupid, the first kiss was sweet, the first love was irreplaceable, the first was sad.

source: 当你真正喜欢一样东西，但它又给你带来伤害的时候，其实这是老天在考验你是否足够坚持。
result: When you really like something, but it hurts you again, it's actually a test of whether you're insistent or not.

source: 中国和塔吉克斯坦将进一步加强军事合作
result: China and Tajikistan will further strengthen military cooperation

source: 聪明的人未必成功
result: Smart people don't necessarily succeed.

source: 活在当下
result: Live in the present.

source: 抱紧我，就像你在纳波湖边那样。
result: Hold me tight, just like you did at Lake Napo.

source: 你所做的，要交托耶和华，你所谋的，就必成立
result: What you have done shall be entrusted to the Lord, and that which you have plotted shall be established.

source: 开心一点，管它怎样
result: Be happy. Whatever.

source: 对你的帮助我感激不尽。
result: I'm very grateful for your help.

source: 被判刑的人上书州长请求慈悲。
result: The governor of the convicted person filed a petition for mercy.

source: 对自己爱的人所做的事才是最重要的
result: What you do to someone you love is all that matters.

source: 再找到合适的人之前，唯一需要做的，就是让自己足够优秀
result: The only thing that needs to be done before we find the right person is to be good enough.

source: 说自己失去勇气，是为了等待一个人给自己力量。
result: To say that he has lost his courage is to wait for a man to give himself strength.

source: 爱情的感情线，你与我只有一线之隔，我们以为可以给与对方更多的爱，但是最终发现原来你什么都不想要。
result: The line of love, you're only one line away from me, and we thought we could give each other more love, but we finally found out that you didn't want anything.

source: 对待朋友关系要慎重，有时可能是自己误解了朋友，先从自己身上找原因为好。
result: Care must be taken in dealing with friends, and sometimes it may be that they misunderstand their friends and find reasons for themselves first.

source: 宠爱是欺诈的，美丽是空虚的
result: Love is a fraud, beauty is empty.

source: 每个人有自己的宿命，一切又与他人何干
result: Everyone has their destiny. What does everything have to do with anyone else?

source: 如果一个人真的想见你，他会动用各种方式，翻遍全世界找到你。
result: If a man really wants to see you, he'll use every means to find you all over the world.

source: 有些改天不再是改天了，可有些改天就是永远永远的改天
result: Some days are no longer another, but some are forever.

source: 这儿现在开始下雨了
result: It's starting to rain here.

source: 据说当你失眠的时候，你将会在别人的梦里出现！
result: It's said that when you're insomnia, you'll appear in someone else's dreams!

source: 假如有一天我们不在一起了，也要像在一起一样
result: If we don't get together one day, we'll be together.

source: 我想知道你有没有片刻想起过我，因为我一直在想你。
result: I want to know if you remember me for a moment because I've been thinking about you.

source: 有些人会一直停留在你心里，却永远不会出现在你生活里
result: Some people will stay in your heart but never be in your life.

source: 希望可以把人调成静音模式。
result: It is hoped to turn people into silent mode.

source: 可能你更愿意去按照自己的方式做事。但事实上，你应该静下心来，多聆听下别人的建议。
result: Maybe you'd rather do it your way. But in fact, you should be quiet and listen to other people's advice.

source: 同一个人，笑得时候非常美，如果想起伤心事哭了，虽然还美，但比笑得时候逊色不少。
result: The same person laughs very beautifully and cries when it comes to grief, even though it's beautiful, it's a lot worse than laughs.

source: 通过注射肌肉细胞，加强膀胱周围现存肌肉的肌力，可减轻尿失禁的症状和降低尴尬尿漏的可能性
result: By injecting muscle cells and strengthening the muscle strength of existing muscles around the bladder, the symptoms of incontinence can be reduced and the likelihood of embarrassing leaks can be reduced

source: 学习的美妙之处是谁也不能把它从你身上拿走。
result: The beauty of learning is that no one can take it away from you.

source: 为你，我变成了更好的自己。
result: For you, I became better myself.

source: 我们真的很投缘
result: We're really close.

source: 一息若存，希望不灭。
result: There is no hope, no hope, no hope, no hope, no hope, no hope, no hope, no hope, no hope, no hope, no hope, no hope, no hope, no hope, no hope, no hope, no hope, no hope, no hope, no hope, no hope, no hope, no hope, no hope, no hope, no hope, no hope, no hope.

source: 生活就像过山车。你可以在每次颠簸的时候尖叫，你也可以高举双手享受整个过程。
result: Life is like a roller coaster. You can scream every time you bump, and you can have the whole process with your hands up.

source: 亲爱的妈咪，也许我不会总是喜欢你，但我会一直爱你。
result: Dear Mommy, maybe I won't always like you, but I'll always love you.

source: 开心一点，管它怎样。
result: Be happy, whatever.

source: 选择也需要能力。
result: The choice also requires capacity.

source: 你走了，我要好好奋斗，好好谈恋爱，轻松地去忘掉你。
result: You're gone. I'm going to fight, fall in love and forget you easily.

source: 用期待迎接新的一天，抛掉不美好的回忆，对美好的明天充满信心
result: We're looking forward to a new day, and we're going to throw away our bad memories, and we're going to have faith in the good of tomorrow.

source: 众里寻他千百度，蓦然回首，那人却在灯火阑珊处。
result: And they looked for him a thousand degrees, and turned back, and the man smote the camp with a light.

source: 典型的恶意营销传播，不顾法律和道德底线
result: Typical malicious marketing spreads, disregarding legal and moral boundaries.

source: 人人为我，我为人人。
result: All for me, all for all.

source: 人们靠行动而生活，而不是想法
result: People live by action, not by thought.

source: 那些真正爱我们的人，其实真的不曾离开，你总能在心的某一处找到他们。
result: Those who truly love us have never really left, and you can always find them somewhere in your heart.

source: 让每个人都知道今天的你比昨天的你更加强大，而且你将会越来越强
result: Let everyone know you're stronger today than you were yesterday, and you're going to get stronger.

source: 开心一点吧，管它会怎样。
result: Be happy, whatever it is.

source: 每个人都注定要遇到那个特别的人。你要做的就是等待老天将他带到你的身边
result: Everyone is destined to meet that special person. All you have to do is wait for God to bring him to you.

source: 被击倒不是最大的失败，没有尝试才是真正的失败。
result: To be defeated is not the biggest failure; to be defeated without trying is a real failure.

source: 年轻的时候会想要谈很多次恋爱，但是随着年龄的增长，终于领悟到爱一个人，就算用一辈子的时间，还是嫌不够
result: When you're young, you want to have a lot of love, but as you get older, you finally realize that you love someone, even if it takes a lifetime, it's not enough.

source: 我想你，有一点点深，有一点点频繁，还一天比一天更浓。
result: I think you're, like, a little deep, a little more frequent, and a day is thicker than a day.

source: 父母呼。应勿缓。
result: Parents call. Don't slow down.

source: 人们总说时间会改变一切，可事实上你得靠自己去改变一切。
result: People always say that time changes everything, but in fact you have to change everything on your own.

source: 在温室中长大的花朵，拉出去就死掉，而在路边长起来的野草，烧都烧不干净
result: Flowers grow up in greenhouses, they die when they're pulled out, and weeds grow up on the side of the road, they can't burn.

source: 青菜萝卜各有所爱
result: The cabbage radishes love each other.

source: 感谢我的不完美，让我看清了真正对我好的人是谁
result: Thanks to my imperfections, I can see who's really good to me.

source: 最可怕的事莫过于行动中的无知。
result: Nothing is more terrible than ignorance in action.

source: 心中的伤痛总是不知不觉渐渐愈合，虽然我们也曾痛苦地发誓说永不忘记。
result: The pain in our hearts always heals unwittingly, though we also swore painfully that we would never forget it.

source: 我主张把进购鲜橙的数量控制在合理水平，以防止其随着时间的推移而霉变。
result: I advocate keeping the quantity of imported and purchased oranges at reasonable levels in order to prevent them from becoming molded over time.

source: 我就是我，由每条伤痕成就。
result: I am what I am, by every scar.

source: 在邻舍面前击掌作保，乃是无知的人。
result: High-handedness in the presence of a neighbour is an ignorant man.

source: 只有强者才能勇敢直面困难时刻，做出艰难抉择。而你正是这样一位强者。
result: Only the strong can face difficult times and make tough choices. You are such a strong man.

source: 很多事情不能自己掌控，即使再孤单再寂寞，仍要继续走下去。不许停也不能回头。
result: Many things cannot be managed by themselves, even if they are lonely and lonely. No stopping and no turning back.

source: 累了就睡觉，醒来就微笑。
result: Sleep when you're tired and smile when you wake up.

source: 在任何时候，生活是困难还是简单完全取决于你如何调整自己，适应生活。
result: At all times, whether life is difficult or simple depends entirely on how you adjust to life.

source: 对他人的成功一样欢欣鼓舞
result: I'm just as excited about the success of others.

source: 这个碗与餐馆需要的食物无关。
result: This bowl has nothing to do with the food that the restaurant needs.

source: 不是没想过放弃，只是始终没有办法做到。
result: It's not that I didn't want to give up, it's just that there's always no way to do it.

source: 有爱的地方就有痛
result: Where there's love, there's pain.

source: 我开车，你到后座去小睡一下。
result: I'll drive, you take a nap in the back seat.

source: 只要我们有回忆，昨天就依然在。只要我们有希望，明天就在招手。只要我们心中有爱，今天就是美好的
result: As long as we have memories, we were there yesterday. As long as we had hope, we waved tomorrow. As long as we had love in our hearts, today was wonderful.

source: 我们将举行一个会议，会议时间表如下。
result: We will hold a meeting, the schedule of which is set out below.

source: 清洁、高洁、初恋、自由、爽朗、永远快乐，你是我最可爱的波斯菊。
result: Clean, clean, first love, free, happy, always. You're my cutest Persian daisy.

source: 我们永远支持你！我们当年的死党！加油！恩，我会一直等你，遇到谁也不会动心，心里只有你
result: We'll always be there for you! Let's go, best friend! Well, I'll be waiting for you.

source: 溺水胡抓草，病急乱投医。
result: Drowning herbs, desperate for medical treatment.

source: 当爱向你诉说时，请相信她，尽管她的声音可能打破你的梦想，就如同北风吹落花园里所有的花瓣
result: When love talks to you, trust her, even though her voice may break your dreams, as if the north wind were blowing down all the petals in the garden.

source: 生活有时是令人沮丧的，但你可以努力的让自己的过得开心。
result: Life is sometimes frustrating, but you can try to make yourself happy.

source: 爱，仅是文字，幸好有你，赋予定义。
result: Love, just words, fortunately with you, gives definition.

source: 快乐的旅伴犹如妙曲
result: ♪ Happy travel companions are like a song ♪

source: 爱情，要么让人成长，要么让人沉沦。
result: Love, whether it grows or falls.

source: 如果谁能把什么事都做好，我说让他去吧，给他一个机会
result: If anyone can do anything right, I say let him do it. Give him a chance.

source: 好书正如良友，会让你受益终生。
result: A good book, like a good friend, will benefit you for the rest of your life.

source: 一些稀土的价格已在短短三周内增加一倍。目前中国大量囤积稀土令市场担心全球供应
result: Prices of some rare earth have doubled in just three weeks. Today, China's vast accumulation of rare earth is causing the market to worry about global supply.

source: 亲爱的，我对你发脾气，是因为你对我来说更亲近。
result: Honey, I'm mad at you because you're closer to me.

source: 我们想为这批货物投保全损险。
result: We want to insure the entire cargo.

source: 时间能医治一切创伤。
result: Time heals all wounds.

source: 人的善良或邪恶都存在于他自己的意志之中
result: A man's good or evil is in his own will.

source: 忒修斯之船
result: The ship of Titus.

source: 幽长黑暗的隧道尽头必有希望之光
result: There must be a light of hope at the end of a long, dark tunnel.

source: 能发现自己的错误是智慧，能改正自己的错误是勇敢。
result: It is wisdom to find its own mistakes, and courage to correct its own mistakes.
